name: Freedom Sky Flight Pro
description:
Do you play with toys? Have you ever dreamed of being a pilot and flying your own Jet-plane?
What if you get to fly it in a place far far away?

you have your own 3D plane, go ahead and play with it. You have to be smart to collect your 'life' Coins and also protect yourself from the big mountains in your way. Difficulty level increases as you progress.

Remember, you need to score high to get good ratings and to win, you need to survive as long as you can.

The game play is very simple and should not be missed. You get a chance to view some amazing graphics and sound effects.

Check out some of the snapshots. Download it now and play the advanced 2.5D look specially designed for smart kids. Its a beautiful looking 2.5D game
